main.name: Ihsan Rawi
main.description: Fullstack Software Engineer by day, self learner at night.
main.bio: A Software Developer with 3 years’ experience looking for opportunity to share his expertise and knowledge. Experienced in developing and supporting business critical applications ranging from web application, database optimization, reporting service and mobile application with a determine and can-do attitude and work great in a team or independently. I am willing to learn and a fast learner. Have experience using ASP .NET framework, NodeJS, Microsoft SQL Server, Java, Spring, Hibernate, ReactJS, React Native.
main.contactmessage: Think I'd be a good fit for your team? I'd love to hear from you, give me a shout by email if you'd like to get in contact with me.

resume.skillmessage: I always improving my skills and interested in testing around with new technologies but these are the ones that have really won me over

work.title: Application Development Analyst
work.description:
Develop and support a range of modules web application solutions in an agile delivery environment for Accenture Distribution Management System (DMS) supporting client in FMCG companies. 

Project Involved: Accenture Distribution Management System (DMS) 

Supporting Client: Reckitt Benckiser 

C# Programming Language, ASP.Net, SQL Server Reporting Service, SQL Server Integration Service, Microsoft SQL Server, IIS, JavaScript, NodeJS, CSS, Git 

Responsibilities: 
- Involved in designing and developing Change Request (CR) and bug fixing for Accenture DMS system across all components including web App, reporting service, mobile apps as well as Integration module. 
- Deal with client support ticketing based on the priority level and deliver fixes in a timely manner without breaking SLA solution time 
- Maintaining and improving current Database Management System: 
	• SQL stored procedure performance tuning 
	• Create day- end script for SQL Agent 
	• Create SQL trigger 
	• Create new SP script based on client’s requirements 
- Improve data generation on Report by performing data retrieval optimization. 
- Deploy fixes and CR to UAT and PROD and infra services upgrade. 
- Merge Change Request with current code base. 

Key achievement and contribution: 
• Involved in internal project of developing the next version of DMS hybrid mobile apps with development not having a delay with multiple teams across countries. 
• Successfully lead a team of 3 people for application server migration and framework setup comprising of 27 countries application environments.

work.title: System Engineer
work.description:
Develop and support web application and mobile apps in a fintech industry for a client that provide financial solution to small companies. Throughout my employment here, I was in a team developing an agent monitoring tv application and onboarding web and mobile apps. 

Project Involved: Infopro Digital Banking Solution, Infopro dashboard application 

Java, JSP, JSF, Spring, Hibernate, PL-SQL, DojoJs, HTML5, SCSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, Git, GulpJ 

Responsibilities: 
- Develop a SPA web application using JavaScript, DojoJs library, SCSS and build Hybrid mobile apps using Cordova. 
- Develop Rest API to bridge between client and server side using Java, Spring and Hibernate frameworks 
- Support and fix application bugs found during QAT and UAT stage of development 
- Developed a Server-side application using JSP.

testimonials.text: Ihsan has a positive attitude and always shows interest on learning new things.
Good team player and very helpful.
